pinyin: zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1

definitions.zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1: place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's 'The Art of War' 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger; fig. to find a way out of an impasse;
